scripts.dev: npx env-cmd -f ./config/.env.dev npx tsx watch src/app.ts
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: npx env-cmd -f ./config/.env.dev npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: npx env-cmd -f ./config/.env.prod npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:push:dev: npx env-cmd -f ./config/.env.dev npx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:status:dev: npx env-cmd -f ./config/.env.dev npx prisma migrate status
